content: SAN FRANCISCO  March 6 Microsoft Corp  sued Kyocera Corp for patent infringement on Friday  alleging the Japanese company's Duraforce  Hydro and Brigadier cell phone lines violate seven Microsoft patents.
name: Kyocera Corporation
title: UPDATE 1-Microsoft sues Kyocera over cell phones  seeks U.S. injunction

content: SAN FRANCISCO  March 6 Microsoft Corp  sued Kyocera Corp for patent infringement on Friday  alleging Kyocera's Duraforce  Hydro and Brigadier cell phone lines infringe seven Microsoft patents.
